answer:
In B.C., influenza (flu) vaccines are usually available in October (often late October). You can find more information on influenza vaccines here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In B.
C.
, influenza (flu) vaccines are usually available in October (often late October).

You can find more information on influenza vaccines here.
